name: Jump. 2D
description:
Jump. 2D is the prequel to a game made for the DevSquad Jam of July 2018.   Jump. 2D was created for the Square Jam held by Blackbox Publisher,  in 2 days.

(The game's art will be improved after the game jam, along with more levels being added.)

Story:

A company called YSpace have developed two brand new technologies, room warping and the Jump. Gun, a gun that allows its user to jump up to 2 times higher.  This technology is planned to be used on a long-distance spaceflight, in space - but it needs to be tested on Earth first, so they "hire" the player to test this new technology, through a series of medical examinations.  The player must complete these exams, so that the technology can be approved for use in practice.
